channel.title: Lukas Carvajal
channel.description: Android, iOS, and Ruby on Rails Developer

item.title: First blog post!
item.description: Just got a couple sites up and running, including this blog on github. I am using neocities to build awesome websites that use html, css, and javascript, which is enough to display information and build a presence on the web. Hosting is free, so pretty much the only yearly cost for these sites are domain name fees. Check out my page for my services!
